recommended_strategies: Increase Socratic questioning to prevent direct answer seeking
Incorporate more 'why' and 'how' questions to encourage reflection
Provide more structured guidance with progressive complexity

system_improvements: Strengthen Socratic agent to better prevent cognitive offloading
Enhance question generation to promote deeper critical thinking
pedagogical_strategies: Implement adaptive difficulty based on proficiency level
Use multi-agent coordination for complex design challenges
Track metacognitive development through reflection prompts
future_research: Investigate long-term retention of spatial reasoning skills
